Articles.Content:
Hello

I have a question, I tried to search but I didn't find if it was already covered.

When dealing with big bases having a lot of different resource containers, the resource panel on the right side doesn't show them all and there is not a way to scroll down (as with the stock game resources you never  overcome the space available)

There is a solution of some kind to this?

Thanks

> 
> 
> On 5/15/2021 at 2:46 AM, TruthfulGnome said:
> 
> 
> could you add the MethaneOxi to the stock parts please? or is there anyway i could change the MethaneLqdOxygen to MethaneOxidizer
> 

Were you able to get it working?

Its been a pain lol

> 
> 
> On 5/25/2021 at 11:59 AM, DiegoKeys said:
> 
> 
> Hello
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I have a question, I tried to search but I didn't find if it was already covered.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> When dealing with big bases having a lot of different resource containers, the resource panel on the right side doesn't show them all and there is not a way to scroll down (as with the stock game resources you never  overcome the space available)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> There is a solution of some kind to this?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Thanks
> 

Yes

[https://sites.google.com/site/kspalternateresourcepanel/](https://sites.google.com/site/kspalternateresourcepanel/)

<iframe allowfullscreen="" data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" data-embedauthorid="57838" data-embedcontent="" data-embedid="embed9424596648" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/54876-19x-ksp-alternate-resource-panel-v21000-april-26/&do=embed"></iframe>

> 
> 
> On 6/3/2021 at 4:11 PM, Nodnam said:
> 
> 
> Were you able to get it working?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Its been a pain lol
> 

MethaneOxi  is added a a fuel  tan k mode and as a fuel mod to methane engine

**Edited <time datetime="2021-06-04T15:08:00Z" title="06/04/2021 03:08  PM" data-short="3 yr">June 4, 2021</time> by FreeThinker**

Is there a config that only uses the stock fuels and/or adds xenon to the other stock tanks? I would like to be able to just have to scroll though the stock fuels as well as have the toroidal tank use xenon.

I did try to edit the config to only use stock fuels but I am not a coder so I did not make it work.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-06-15T21:47:05Z" title="06/15/2021 09:47  PM" data-short="3 yr">June 15, 2021</time> by tsjm13**
  
more detail and grammar
Anyone tried this on 1.12 yet?

I got a lot of errors while loading that all seemed to point at patches.cfg and activemmpatches.cfg but the game loaded up. Haven't tried using any of the parts yet, need to get deeper into my career save.

I just installed the Community Resource Pack (and Universal Storage II) and now get no errors on load.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-13T18:43:24Z" title="07/13/2021 06:43  PM" data-short="2 yr">July 13, 2021</time> by thescaryone**

It seems to work, but Patch manager prevents the game from even trying to load in 1.12 so you have to delete that. Also tweakscale throws a message in startup saying it isn't compatible and may corrupt so you should probably toss it out too. (The file 999\_Scale\_Redist.dll is required though)

Should the expanding IST2501lqd tank have <abbr title="Liquid Fuel and Oxidizer">LFO</abbr>, <abbr title="Liquid Fuel">LF</abbr>, O as switch options by default, or do I need to add those somehow?  What is the best way to add them if that is what I need to do?  Ideas welcome

How can I do to make the tanks have ARGON GAS inside? 

I downloaded INTERSTELLAR FUEL SWITCH CORE, INTRSTLR. REDISTRIBUTABLE, KSP INTRSLR.  EXTENDED and THIS MOD. 

It will only show all different types of fuels but argon gas... There is a Liquid Argon but my engines from NEAR FUTURE PROPULSION, can't use it.

> 
> 
> 22 hours ago, adriangm44 said:
> 
> 
> How can I do to make the tanks have ARGON GAS inside? 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I downloaded INTERSTELLAR FUEL SWITCH CORE, INTRSTLR. REDISTRIBUTABLE, KSP INTRSLR.  EXTENDED and THIS MOD. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> It will only show all different types of fuels but argon gas... There is a Liquid Argon but my engines from NEAR FUTURE PROPULSION, can't use it.
> 

Use one of the  the IFS Gas Tanks
Does it work in 1,12,2?
Just checked, and no. It completely stops my game from loading

Yet for other people it works (since you are the first reporting this and this is a popular mod), how strange. 

Edit: sorry for my cynical response. I just think you should provide more info, instead of just saying 'it don't work'.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-09-12T14:45:52Z" title="09/12/2021 02:45  PM" data-short="2 yr">September 12, 2021</time> by modus**
it dont work

> 
> 
> 15 hours ago, walkerjc8 said:
> 
> 
> it dont work
> 

Welcome to the forums.

See the post above yours and read the topic in my sig block for guidance on how to report problems because you haven't provided much information.   Likely you have an installation error or a mod incompatibility.
It's a problem with MiniAVC. Install Zero MiniAVC as a work around.

Hello I played with this mod a long time ago and it was ok.

I am trying to play <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> on 1.11.2 with IFS and all my mods updated and  I can't see any fuel nor any menu that allow to change fuel in my tanks with that mod!! IFS tanks are empty, no menu is showing when I select them....

Is there any dependency other than Module manager and Patch manager to make IFS working? 

Thank you

The Watchdog just annoys me.

- ~~There is only one 666\_ModuleManagerWatchDog.dll~~
    - ~~There is "ModuleManagerWatchDog" v1.0.1.1~~
- ~~There is only ONE 999\_Scale\_Redist.dll~~
    - ~~There is NO "TweakScale" folder~~

~~Why do I still get "the message" and are thrown out of KSP to be forwarded to [https://ksp.lisias.net/add-ons/WatchDog/ScaleRedist](https://ksp.lisias.net/add-ons/WatchDog/ScaleRedist) ?~~

~~Do  I have to prune GameData\ModuleManagerWatchDog\Plugins\WatchDogForScaleRedist.dll ?~~

Edit:

Ah, I guess I got it - GameData\FerramAerospaceResearch\Plugins\Scale\_Redist.dll ...

**Edited <time datetime="2021-11-04T22:55:11Z" title="11/04/2021 10:55  PM" data-short="2 yr">November 4, 2021</time> by Gordon Dry**

Hi everyone o/ I got a small problem atm, i cannot choose Monopropellant as fuel for my tanks ![:/](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon1.png ":/") But maybe i'm thinking it's because i don't have high researchs done ? (under 90 science points done, not more yet). Or it's a bug in the mod ? I can only place the small rounded tanks around rockets for monopropellant for now. Auto-Answer : Jebediah was right ! My Kerbs needed the "Advanced Fuel Systems" technology to get access to the Monopropellant as choice for other tanks ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") Well , at least if someone want to ask too he have answer here *"* *PLANT A FLAG"*. PS : i'm a kerbal veteran re-making a game with new mods stuff & etc ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") **Edited January 2, 2022 by Meliandah** Found Answer

> 
> 
> On 11/13/2020 at 6:08 PM, winterchillz said:
> 
> 
> Hi,
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I'm having a rather peculiar issue with IFS and I was hoping you guys would be able to help me out.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> For some reason, even though the tank description says it has LH2O option available, the said option isn't actually possible when trying to switch the fuel to it. I wonder if there's something funky going on between this mod and the Cryo Tanks mod? The menus seem different too when trying to switch the fuel on two different tank types.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Standard tank:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [![xEcE5bS.png](https://i.imgur.com/xEcE5bS.png)](https://i.imgur.com/xEcE5bS.png "Enlarge image")
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Cryo tank:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [![g06jzZ3.png](https://i.imgur.com/g06jzZ3.png)](https://i.imgur.com/g06jzZ3.png "Enlarge image")
> 

I'm having this same issue.  Is there a fix?  Both ISFS and Cryo Tanks are dependencies for other mods I'd rather not lose.

[EDIT]  I should note that it's working correctly (all options are available on standard tanks) in Sandbox mode.  The problem exists in Career mode, with only part of the tech tree unlocked.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-05T18:44:10Z" title="01/05/2022 06:44  PM" data-short="2 yr">January 5, 2022</time> by SilverlightPony**
Any word on this for 1.12.3 yet?

> 
> 
> On 9/15/2021 at 2:33 AM, 6d7770 said:
> 
> 
> It's a problem with MiniAVC. Install Zero MiniAVC as a work around.
> 

I did, didn't work

Using 1.12.3
Any alternatives or work arounds to this mod? Doesn't seem to work in 1.12.

Am also having issues in 1.12.3,  The best alternative I've found is a mod called Configurable Containers. But I have difficulty putting the right ratios of fuel into the tanks, something this mod does very well. B9Partswitch also works with *some* tanks but not all of them for some reason

is the 999\_Scale\_Redist.dll only a dependency for those with tweakscale?

Edit: nvm
